accueil.para1: Today, the t-shirt is a staple in everyone's wardrobe. And in an era where environmental concerns are more pressing than ever, we prefer t-shirts made in Quebec to reduce environmental impact and highlight local craftsmanship.
accueil.para2: V-neck, round neck, loose or fitted, short-sleeved or long-sleeved for the chilly ones, plain or patterned to style an outfit... The t-shirt is available in a variety of colors, styles, and patterns.
